Home.title: Thiago Alves
Home.description: I develop on the frontend with JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Redux Toolkit and Tailwind. On the backend, I work with Python, Django and Mysql, creating complete, modern and efficient applications.

Projects.ddmn: My first paid website created for a construction company in Joinville
